title: 3 Lions on a shirt
content:
Three lions on a shirt  
Jules Rimet still gleaming  
No more years of hurt  
No more need for dreaming

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101204155755im_/http:/typophile.com/files/becs_0014_4358.jpg)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20101204155755im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2out3lions_0020_3446.jpg)
author: vinceconnare

comments.content:
You're talking about Australia's fantastic entry into the World Cup (after 30 odd years)? :P

----------  
**Paul Ducco**  
Solid Creative  
 [Communication Design, Melbourne](http://web.archive.org/web/20101204155755/http:/www.solid-creative.com/)
Answer: Becks, Puma Pace and Trebuchet launched on the BBC
